setFunctionCode(int) - Method in class com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.msg.ModbusMessageImpl
Sets the function code of this ModbusMessage.
The function code should be a 1-byte non negative integer value valid in the range of 0-127.
Function codes are ordered in conformance classes their values are specified in com.ghgande.j2mod.modbus.Modbus.
